attributes.action: A vote of non-confidence on the Labour Party
attributes.additional_details:
This is a hypocritical and disgraceful way to treat a leader that has literally thousands of supporters behind him. Corbyn would stand in the 2020 elections in a time of turmoil and give the people what they want.

We want the opposition led by Corbyn and NOT by the current, Blairite Labour Party who clearly have NO regard for the people.
attributes.background:
The Labour Party have voted to over throw Jeremy Corbyn from the leadership based on his "poor performance" in the Remain campaign.

Please sign to show your support for the leader of the party and by 'voting' on a no-confidence on the current Labour Party.

rejection.details: The leadership of a political party is a matter for the party concerned, not the Government or Parliament.
